prompt.content:
How large was the range (in % terms) for Walmart Inc. (WMT)'s fiscal year 2026 adjusted EPS guidance for Q4 2025, Q1 2026, Q2 2026, and Q3 2026?
 
 Format answer as: "Q[X] [YEAR]: $[X.XX] (low) to $[X.XX] (high), [X.XX]% of midpoint". Add line breaks for each period, and round the EPS figure and % to two decimal places.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q4 2025 guidance: $2.50 (low) to $2.60 (high)"},{"criteria":"Q1 2026 guidance: $2.50 (low) to $2.60 (high)","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q2 2026 guidance: $2.52 (low) to $2.62 (high)"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q3 2026 guidance: $2.58 (low) to $2.63 (high)"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q4 2025 is 3.92% of midpoint"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q1 2026 is 3.92% of midpoint\n"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q2 2026 is 3.89% of midpoint\n"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q3 2026 is 1.92% of midpoint"},{"criteria":"All answers follow the correct format of \"Q[X] [YEAR]: $[X.XX] (low) to $[X.XX] (high), [X.XX]% of midpoint\" ","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"All answers follow the correct format with line breaks for each period","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"All answers follow the correct format with rounding to two decimal places","operator":"correctness"}]
